LoginPage.description: This is the Login page for OrangeHRM. Users enter their credentials to access the system.

elements.name: Username Input
elements.description: Input field for the username.

elements.name: Password Input
elements.description: Input field for the password.

elements.name: Login Button
elements.description: Button to submit the login form.

elements.name: Forgot your password?
elements.description: Link to navigate to the 'Forgot Password' page.

assertions: Page title contains 'OrangeHRM'
Login header is visible
Username input field is present
Password input field is present
Login button is present

OrangehrmDashboardPage.description: The Dashboard page provides an overview of key information and quick actions for the user.

elements.name: Dashboard Header
elements.description: The main header of the Dashboard page.

elements.name: Time at Work Card
elements.description: Card displaying the user's time at work information.

elements.name: My Actions Card
elements.description: Card displaying the user's pending actions.

elements.name: Quick Launch Card
elements.description: Card displaying quick launch options.

elements.name: Buzz Latest Posts Card
elements.description: Card displaying the latest posts from Buzz.

elements.name: Assign Leave Quick Launch
elements.description: Button to navigate to the Assign Leave page.

elements.name: Leave List Quick Launch
elements.description: Button to navigate to the Leave List page.

elements.name: Timesheets Quick Launch
elements.description: Button to navigate to the Timesheets page.

elements.name: Apply Leave Quick Launch
elements.description: Button to navigate to the Apply Leave page.

elements.name: My Leave Quick Launch
elements.description: Button to navigate to the My Leave page.

elements.name: My Timesheet Quick Launch
elements.description: Button to navigate to the My Timesheet page.

elements.name: User Profile Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown button to access user profile options.

assertions: Verify the page title contains 'OrangeHRM'
Verify the 'Dashboard' header is displayed
Verify the 'Time at Work' card is displayed
Verify the 'My Actions' card is displayed
Verify the 'Quick Launch' card is displayed
Verify the 'Buzz Latest Posts' card is displayed

EmployeeListPage.description: This page displays a list of employees and allows filtering and adding new employees.

elements.name: Employee Name Filter
elements.description: Input field to filter employees by name.

elements.name: Employee Id Filter
elements.description: Input field to filter employees by ID.

elements.name: Employment Status Filter
elements.description: Dropdown to filter employees by employment status.

elements.name: Include Filter
elements.description: Dropdown to filter employees by inclusion status.

elements.name: Supervisor Name Filter
elements.description: Input field to filter employees by supervisor name.

elements.name: Job Title Filter
elements.description: Dropdown to filter employees by job title.

elements.name: Sub Unit Filter
elements.description: Dropdown to filter employees by sub unit.

elements.name: Reset Button
elements.description: Button to reset the filter criteria.

elements.name: Search Button
elements.description: Button to apply the filter criteria.

elements.name: Add Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the Add Employee page.

elements.name: PIM Menu Item
elements.description: Menu item to navigate to the PIM section.

assertions: Assert that the page title contains 'Employee List'
Assert that the 'Employee Information' header is displayed
Assert that the 'Add' button is displayed
Assert that the employee table is displayed
Assert that the URL contains '/pim/viewEmployeeList'

AddEmployeeOrangehrmPage.description: This page is used to add a new employee to the OrangeHRM system.

elements.name: First Name
elements.description: Input field for the employee's first name.

elements.name: Middle Name
elements.description: Input field for the employee's middle name.

elements.name: Last Name
elements.description: Input field for the employee's last name.

elements.name: Employee Id
elements.description: Input field for the employee's ID.

elements.name: Create Login Details Toggle
elements.description: Toggle to enable or disable creating login details for the new employee.

elements.name: Save Button
elements.description: Button to save the new employee's information.

elements.name: Cancel Button
elements.description: Button to cancel adding a new employee.

elements.name: Add Profile Picture
elements.description: Button to upload a profile picture for the employee.

assertions: Assert that the page title is 'OrangeHRM'
Assert that the header text is 'Add Employee'
Assert that the 'First Name' field is present
Assert that the 'Last Name' field is present
Assert that the 'Save' button is present

OrangehrmPimPersonalDetailsPage.description: This page allows users to view and modify the personal details of an employee within the OrangeHRM system.

elements.name: FirstName Field
elements.description: Input field for the employee's first name.

elements.name: MiddleName Field
elements.description: Input field for the employee's middle name.

elements.name: LastName Field
elements.description: Input field for the employee's last name.

elements.name: Employee Id Field
elements.description: Input field for the employee's ID.

elements.name: Other Id Field
elements.description: Input field for the employee's other ID.

elements.name: Driver's License Number Field
elements.description: Input field for the employee's driver's license number.

elements.name: License Expiry Date Field
elements.description: Input field for the employee's license expiry date.

elements.name: Nationality Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown for selecting the employee's nationality.

elements.name: Marital Status Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown for selecting the employee's marital status.

elements.name: Date of Birth Field
elements.description: Input field for the employee's date of birth.

elements.name: Gender Male Radio Button
elements.description: Radio button for selecting the employee's gender as male.

elements.name: Gender Female Radio Button
elements.description: Radio button for selecting the employee's gender as female.

elements.name: Save Button
elements.description: Button to save the personal details.

assertions: Assert that the page title contains 'OrangeHRM'
Assert that the 'Personal Details' header is displayed
Assert that the 'First Name' field is present
Assert that the 'Save' button is present

OrangehrmSystemUsersPage.description: This page allows administrators to manage system users, including searching, adding, editing, and deleting users.

elements.name: Username Filter
elements.description: Input field to filter users by username.

elements.name: User Role Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown to filter users by role.

elements.name: Employee Name Filter
elements.description: Input field to filter users by employee name.

elements.name: Status Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown to filter users by status.

elements.name: Reset Button
elements.description: Button to reset the filter criteria.

elements.name: Search Button
elements.description: Button to apply the filter criteria.

elements.name: Add Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the Add User page.

elements.name: Username Column Header
elements.description: Column header for Username.

elements.name: User Role Column Header
elements.description: Column header for User Role.

elements.name: Employee Name Column Header
elements.description: Column header for Employee Name.

elements.name: Status Column Header
elements.description: Column header for Status.

elements.name: Delete Icon
elements.description: Delete icon for the first user in the table.

elements.name: Edit Icon
elements.description: Edit icon for the first user in the table.

assertions: Page title is 'OrangeHRM'
Header text is 'System Users'
Add button is present
Search button is present
Reset button is present
Table of users is displayed

AddUserPage.description: This page is used to add a new user to the OrangeHRM system.

elements.name: User Role Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown to select the user role (Admin or ESS).

elements.name: Employee Name Input
elements.description: Input field to enter the employee's name.

elements.name: Username Input
elements.description: Input field to enter the username.

elements.name: Password Input
elements.description: Input field to enter the password.

elements.name: Confirm Password Input
elements.description: Input field to confirm the password.

elements.name: Cancel Button
elements.description: Button to cancel adding a new user.

elements.name: Save Button
elements.description: Button to save the new user.

assertions: Page title is 'OrangeHRM'
Header text is 'Add User'
URL contains '/admin/saveSystemUser'
